item.title: Sending email from the Raspberry PI
item.description: I run a remote Raspberry PI gracefully hosted by the people over at raspberrycolocatie.nl Since one if it’s jobs is to run a few scripts monitoring various bits and pieces I want it to be able to send emails. Since I don’t want to use a full blown MTA I settled for ssmtp. It’s worth noting that this setup applies to any debian box, not only the rPI. sSMTP - Simple SMTP sSMTP is a simple MTA to deliver mail from a computer to a mail hub (SMTP server).
